content.rendered:
YOSHOP PAY - Acquiring

    Cost- 150 000 ₸

    SIM card for Internet access - 1,000 tenge per month

    If there is WI-FI where the YOSHOP POS will be located, it is not necessary to purchase
    Connect payment by cards!
    Fast connection and acceptance of all types of payments. Get connected!
    What is YOSHOP PAY?
    YOSHOP PAY is a set of solutions that helps a business to conveniently accept all types of payments.
    Start accepting payments with Mastercard, Visa, Apple Pay and other popular payment methods. Convenient for buyers, profitable for you.

    Feature

    Safety

    Yoshop POS Terminal has a certificate of compliance with payment card data security standards.

    All-in-one

    Contact, NFC, Barcode Scanner, Thermal Printer, etc. The kit contains all the devices necessary for the store.

    Mobility

    It is equipped with Wi-Fi and LTE connectivity for mobility.

    Verified

    Verified products sold over 1,000,000 units worldwide

    Who are we for?

    Our solutions are targeted at small and medium businesses
    Grocery store
    Beauty saloon
    Flower shop
    Cafe/ Restaurant
    Clothing store
    Private clinic

    Certificates

    Specification

    OS
    Android 5.1
    CPU, Memory
    ARM Cortex-A7 Quad-Core , 1GB RAM + 8GB Flash
    Display
    5.5” HD, 1280x720
    IC Reader
    L1&L2 , Contact & Contactless
    Printer & Scanner
    High speed thermal printer
    Paper roll Width / Diameter: 58mm / 40mm 1D & 2D Scanner
    Communication
    4G LTE, WiFi, Bluetooth, GPS
    Expansion slots
    USB-C x1, PSAMx2, SAMx1, TF Card(Maximum 32GB)x1
    Dimension & Weight
    189.91mm x 84.36mm x 67.10 mm , 480g

    Our Solutions

    YOSHOP POS Terminal

    Accepts all types of bank cards. Fixed commission with no turnover requirements. Linking an account of any bank in the Republic of Kazakhstan. Crediting money the next business day.

    150 000 ₸


    Personal Area

    Suitable for managing a convenience store, clothing store, coffee shop, restaurants, pharmacies, etc. Access 365 days a year from any device and from anywhere in the world.


    from 42 000 ₸
    Learn more

    YOSHOP KKM

    Prints fiscal receipts and accepts cash and non-cash payments. Fast connection and acceptance of all types of payments. Connect!



    from 3 000 ₸
    Learn more

    How to connect?

      To connect YOSHOP PAY acquiring, you need to leave a request on our website, after which we will contact you and discuss the details!

      We will answer quickly

      We will advise

      Let's connect
